text: Meulles () is a former commune in the Calvados department in the Normandy region in northwestern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Livarot-Pays-d'Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 24 December 2015 ==Population== ==Sights== *The Statue of Ada. ==See also== *Communes of the Calvados department ==References== Category:Former communes of Calvados (department) Category:Calvados communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia
title: Meulles
